General.Name: Jinyu Bio-Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinyu Bio-technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of veterinary products in China. It product portfolio includes Jinyu Baoling, Yangzhou Youbang, and Liaoning Yikang animal vaccines for the prevention of foot, porcine, mycoplasma pneumoniae, porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome, porcine pseudorabies, pathogenic avian influenza, brucellosis bacterial disease, bovine viral diarrhea and mucosal, infectious rhinotracheitis, and other domestic animal diseases. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hohhot, China.
